settings.testimonial_paragraph: Utiva is a product that delivers on its promises - and as the old saying goes, an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure. This has been a good investment in my personal health.
After menopause I started to get one UTI after another, I couldn't believe what was happening to me. The Utiva cranberry PACs saved my life.

settings.slide_video: shopify://files/videos/How Sandra recovered from chronic UTIs naturally--(720p).mp4
settings.testimonial_paragraph: If you suffer from ongoing urinary tract problems, I want to tell you that there is hope—I'm proof of it.

settings.slide_video: shopify://files/videos/Kathy's struggle with a Silent UTI--(720p).mp4
settings.testimonial_title: No signs but ended up in the hospital
settings.testimonial_paragraph: Plagued with urinary tract problems my whole life, the scariest and worst case was when I had no signs or symptoms but ended up in the hospital with a life-threatening condition.

settings.slide_video: shopify://files/videos/Rachel Walker for Customer Ambassador Program_2_1.mp4
settings.testimonial_title: A simple solution for my UTI problem
settings.testimonial_paragraph: I tried many products for my UTIs, at one point I was taking 15 different supplements. I'm so grateful that I found Utiva, with one pill a day my bladder is very happy.

settings.slide_video: shopify://files/videos/Family history of UTIs - Tamana's Experience--(720p).mp4
settings.testimonial_title: Family history of urinary tract troubles
settings.testimonial_paragraph: Because of my busy work schedule, I sometimes would end up drinking less water than usual and this would aggravate my urinary system.

settings.heading_text: Your story is powerful, and it can bring hope to others
settings.paragraph_text_1: Please help build our inspiring collection of stories by sharing your journey of healing and empowerment.
settings.paragraph_text_2: Tell us about your story and how Utiva has help change your life for the better.

settings.title: Managing recurrent urinary tract issues can be hard.
settings.description: Antibiotics are the first line treatment, but there are clinically proven options to help prevent. When considering cranberry supplements, I recommend my patients select a product with 36 mg of PACs.

settings.title: Overuse of antibiotics is a concern
settings.description: I always consider natural options to help manage urinary tract health in my patients. Utiva is a great, clean cranberry product which has been very effective in many of my patients.

settings.title: Using Utiva with patients has been great
settings.description: There is a lot of evidence that shows that cranberry supplements are safe and effective. You can find all sorts of cranberry supplements but if they don’t have that 36 mg PAC and measured by DMAC/A2 then they are a waste of money.

settings.title: Utiva is clinically proven
settings.description: According to clinical studies you need 36 mg PACs to prevent bacteria from forming an infection in the urinary tract. Utiva is the only brand that has the right dose of cranberry PACs to help prevent UTIs.
